settings.text: With 40 years of experience in the business, we repair jewelry of any type, from antique to modern pieces. We pride ourselves on keeping our clients’ jewelry repairs in Boca Raton, on-site at our location, under our surveillance. This lets us ensure quality control, knowing that only the master jewelers we trust and employ have operated on our clients’ prized possessions. In every repair job we accept, we provide a quote and estimated time of completion to the customer.

settings.heading: To deliver exceptional design solutions that inspire and delight, enhancing the way you live and work.

settings.text: We offer a range of expert jewelry services including ring resizing, refinishing jewelry, prong re-tipping, chain soldering, and replacement ring shanks. Our skilled jewelers also specialize in ring prong repairs, jewelry polishing, clasp repairs, and diamond & stone setting. Additionally, we provide rhodium plating, general restoration, and pearl re-stringing to keep your pieces looking their best.

settings.content: At Raymond Lee Jewelers, we employ full-time jewelers in our store with several decades of combined experience in the field of jewelry repair and design. With skill and precision, our expert jewelers repair jewelry using our on-site state-of-the-art devices and machinery such as bench-mounted zoom microscopes and the latest laser welding technology. Combining skills and advanced equipment, our jewelers are capable of performing complex jewelry repair and restoration work that only a few can handle today.

settings.title: Luxury Timepiece Services
settings.content: Some high-end watch brands that we service include Audemars Piguet, Rolex, Omega, Cartier, IWC, Movado, Patek Philippe, Rolex, Breguet, Breitling, and many others. Our skillful watchmaker can handle complex watch repairs sc minute repeaters, tourbillons, and chronograph services and repairs.

settings.title: Top of the Line Equipment
settings.content: Some high-end watch brands that we service include Audemars Piguet, Rolex, Omega, Cartier, IWC, Movado, Patek Philippe, Rolex, Breguet, Breitling, and many others. Our skillful watchmaker can handle complex watch repairs sc minute repeaters, tourbillons, and chronograph services and repairs.
